import React, { useState } from "react"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; const Signup = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> {/* Button trigger modal */} {/* Modal */} Register {/* */}
Full Name Email address We'll never share your email with anyone else. Contact Number About Age Gender Password
); }; export default Signup;
